tune up.translation[0].definitions[0].de: when musicians tune up, they prepare their instruments to play at the right pitch
tune up.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The band were tuning up their guitars.
tune up.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to make small changes to an engine so that it works as well as possible
tune up.translation[1].definitions[0].de: the process of making small changes to an engine so that it works as well as possible
tune up.translation[1].definitions[1].de: an occasion that someone uses as preparation for a more important occasion
tune up.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: He is treating the semi-finals as a tune-up.
